title: What's new in version 2.0.4
text:
* EkaPool + Dynex support!
* Hiveon Pool now supports Kaspa and Bitcoin
* K1 Pool now supports Kaspa, ETHW and RXD
* Nanopool now supports Kaspa and IronFish
* 2Miners now supports Nexa
* Bug fixes
* Performance improvements

title: Your Feedback Matters: Please Consider Leaving a Review!
text: If you enjoy using Hashrate, please consider leaving a review in the App Store. As an independent developer, positive feedback means the world to me and helps me continue to improve the app. Thank you for your support!

title: What's new in version 2.0.2
text:
Iron Fish support added for the following pools:

* Kryptex
* HeroMiners
* Flexpool
* Ezil
* F2Pool

Also:

* Kaspa support for 2Miners and F2Pool
* ZIL support for K1 Pool
* ETHW and ETHF support for Crazypool

title: What's new in version 2.0.1
text:
* New pool added: Kryptex!
* Bug fixes

title: What's new in version 2.0.0
text:
We're thrilled to announce the latest update to Hashrate!

* New widget: You can now display multiple miners for a single farm on your home screen. This new widget provides even more flexibility for monitoring your mining rigs.
* Improved interface: We've made several improvements to the app's interface, making it more user-friendly and intuitive than ever before.
* Preferred tab selector: With our new tab selector, you can now choose which tab you want to open by default when you launch the app.
* Added K1 Pool support: We've added support for the popular K1 Pool, giving you even more options for tracking your mining activities.
* Bug fixes: We've fixed several bugs and made performance enhancements to ensure the app runs smoothly.

With these new features, Hashrate is more powerful than ever before. Update now and experience the best mining app on the market!
